4318300.name: Dino VR Experience
4318300.description:
Dino VR Museum is an immersive VR experience that transports you into an interactive museum dedicated to dinosaurs. Explore 4 themed areas with animated dinosaurs, discover scientific information, and experience the atmosphere of a real paleontological museum.

During Early Access we will add new areas, dinosaurs, an expanded museum/HUB, and a playground area where you can simulate the excavation and discovery of fossils.

The game is designed for VR players who enjoy exploration, education, and narrative content related to paleontology.
4318300.supported_languages:
英语*, 意大利语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
